cs213.photoAlbum.model

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.model.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The User class contains methods that add, delete, and rename albums in the user's album list.
    Author:
    Nicholas Fong
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
